website_summaries.verdict: Scented with delicious cocoa butter, this Nair hair remover lotion is easy to use. All you need to do is apply, wipe, and rinse.
pros: Infused with cocoa butter and vitamin E. Leaves skin feeling smooth and soft
Works in as little as three minutes
cons: Not safe to use on your face

customer_reviews.title: Horrible reaction to a product I’ve always used.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this one star. I’ve used nair products for years but when I used this today, it caused me to have extreme chemical burns all over my legs. I had this on for less than 8 minutes. I won’t ever order again.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor W

customer_reviews.title: It worked great on my legs (I hadn't shaved or waxed for ...
customer_reviews.text: I had never used nair before so I was skeptical going into this. It worked great on my legs (I hadn't shaved or waxed for over two months and my hair was quite long). My armpits reacted badly to it, but I think I may have rubbed it when it cleaely states not to, so that's on me. I also used it down yonder. I'm suprised how well it worked there. It didn't get everything in the first go, but that bush was highly overgrown.. so again, Ill take the blame for that 😂 Overall, it's an awesome product and I will for sure use again
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not all at once
customer_reviews.text: Works well with multiple applications. They are serious about the maximum time to leave on skin. Skin started bleeding at about 10 minutes, but some fine hair still attached. I find it works best using it 3-5 minutes every other day. After the third time (day five) skin is clear of hair. Using it on back of neck and "bikini" area.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron X

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn’t even deserve ONE STAR...I’ve always purchased Nair from my local pharmacy (ie. Walgreen, CVS, Rite Aid)..I placed some underneath my armpits and within ONE MINUTE my underarms were on fire.....I had to rush in the shower to wipe it off....there is a slight abrasion there burning like hell....this is not the original nair....some type of chemical enhancer is in this product
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work, sets your skin on fire, and smells awful
customer_reviews.text: I am a man and tried to use this on my torso/chest area. After it had time to settle in for a few minutes (as per the instructions), it was like I'd poured acid on my skin. Washing it off didn't help. I had red burn marks and was in mild pain for a day or two after use. And it didn't actually remove any hair! No effect whatsoever in removing hair, and I am sure I followed the directions exactly. Not to mention this stuff smells like an open sewer. "Cocoa Butter" -- hahahaha, no, there is nothing remotely like the scent of cocoa butter going on here.
customer_reviews.author: tqwert1

customer_reviews.title: Infinitely easier than shaving
customer_reviews.text: I am mind blown, because it took 6min to completely clear all hair from both armpits (after not shaving for litterally a month). Infinitely faster than shaving, and didn't miss a hair. My skin still looks and feels fine so no bad reaction. I'm so happy I never have to shave again.
customer_reviews.author: Yuri G

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend spritzing some sort of fragrance or having ventilation when ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells awful, but works. Would recommend spritzing some sort of fragrance or having ventilation when you use it. Takes a little longer of my underarms than my legs (I'm caucasian, and have finer leg hair than my underarms). Takes about 4-5 minutes to completely get rid of leg hair, and about 6-7 minutes for my underarms (it's likely faster to just shave those than to wait and then you won't have to deal with the odor).
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Not for people who have thick hair
customer_reviews.text: I tried this because I really like Nair's in-shower hair remover, but the pump makes it hard to get the last of it out. I was hoping this would be similarly good, but easier to get everything out of the bottle. Unfortunately, it's not nearly as good as the in-shower stuff. It takes longer, irritates my skin more, AND leaves more hair behind. It probably works well for people with very fine hair, but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: Skin damaged
customer_reviews.text: Left it on for the recommended 3 minutes. Ended up with chemical burns. It only removed some hair, not all and my hair is very fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: This brand really works. I've tried lots of other brands (and some other Nair formulations over the years). This is by far the most effective for me. Note that you need to use a lot of it. One bottle gives me 4-5 applications from my ankles to mid-thigh, plus a little on my toes. I do follow directions! I have not tried it on my face or nether regions. So I can't help you on that information.
customer_reviews.author: L. Donahue

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: This made my skin burn so bad after keeping it on for 3 minutes. My skin turned bright red after I took it off. I was left with a lot of irritation, redness, and burning. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Briney

customer_reviews.title: Great cream
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. It was very easy to use, although I had to leave it more than the 3’ they suggested (probably left it for 10’). Apply on dry skin, use wet washcloth to swipe the hair and puff! they’re gone. HOWEVER i must say- if I were to go to the beach where every single little hair can be seen under the sun, maybe I would choose to do a close shave instead. But for routine use to not look like a gorilla it works great!
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: It works fast!! Don't leave for long time.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly leave it for 3 or 2 minutes. And it works fast and leaves my skin so soft! If i use it a lil longer.. yes it will irritate my skin a little. Like make it red and itchy. But I've been using this for years!!! YEARS! And i love it! Better than veet. And they have different options that dont have a bad smell. I think fresh scent is the one that smells less. I like this one because how it leaves my skin super soft! And works fast!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DAISY

customer_reviews.title: Nair Tips from a Long Time User
customer_reviews.text: To anyone who is new to Nair or claims to be a Pro and is lying, 1. Wear gloves. 2. never leave on longer than 4 minutes. 3. lather area with body wash immediately after to get rid of leftover chemicals. 4. Really shouldnt use on sensitive areas like bikini and underarms. Lastly, Product says pack of 3, I got one, complained to cust serv, and got full refund.
customer_reviews.author: ODESSA ASH

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get some no hair cream because my hair grows fast and takes shaving from several directions to get rid of. Tried this as soon as it arrived, followed all the instructions, left it on 10 minutes, and then found it only got rid of 1/3 the hair. Did a second application because maybe i had messed up somehow, another third of the hair gone. I ended up having to shave anyway. At least I didn't have a rash reaction to it.
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: Outdated Product
customer_reviews.text: NAIR in general has a great hair remover. However, this product through Amazon performed poorly. The first bottle was OK... not strong. The other two, needed a couple of applications, with 5-10 minute wait.. I decided to go to another store to get fresh bottle, and worked within a few minutes. I’m assuming the Amazon order was filled with an outdated product.
customer_reviews.author: Miss BC

customer_reviews.title: I hate shaving...
customer_reviews.text: I have had zero issues with Nair for the long amount of time that I had used it. I don't like shaving so I usually use this before hand. If you follow the directions and safety warnings you will most likely avoid getting chemical burns (unless you're allergic to something). Also, DON'T rub it in! It might take a few coats over a few days to be completely hairless but it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Like every other hair remover I've been recommended throughout my life this does absolutely nothing. I've tried it for 3 mins, 5 mins, 8 mins and 10 minutes. It leaves my legs feeling itchy with the hair growing the normal rate as usual. I still have to shave every two days.
customer_reviews.author: A.Justus

customer_reviews.title: Blown Away
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely blown away by this product. The price is amazing. I've always been sceptical about Nair.. How does it even work?? But this price made me try it. And I am SO HAPPY I did. It works so well! 7 minutes and my legs are soft and smooth. And the smell isn't crazy.. No it doesn't smell like shaving cream, but it's not as bad as hair dye so.. I can handle no problem. It's wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Tifiny

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results, HORRIBLE smell
customer_reviews.text: I love this, it makes it very easy to get smooth skin quick, BUT it smells absolutely disgusting. This product works very well for me, I had to leave it on for about 7 minutes and occasionally you'll have to wipe away any remaining hair yourself. It makes my skin very smooth, but everyone's skin type is different so ALWAYS patch test a small area before jumping into it to make sure you don't have a reaction. So 8.5/10, amazing besides the smell
customer_reviews.author: Lily Valiante

customer_reviews.title: Works, but poorly packaged
customer_reviews.text: Don't recommend for sensitive skin- could cause rash. Arrived sticky all over, but a little alcohol should fix that. It should work as intended but use it fast, because it expires within half a year- the product turns watery and doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Moonlit Vampire

customer_reviews.title: With Great Power Comes Great Responsibility
customer_reviews.text: My goodness. This is great. So great I imagined how it would be if I accidentally got some on my head. Didn't shave my armpit for a long time and this made my hair feel fake and I literally didn't need to wipe the product to see the hair fall. Literally would just pinch it off(really lightly too). Also I guess I got some on my arm and didn't notice and now have a bald spot XD Super good. No chemical burns and my legs felt so soft. Just be careful XD
customer_reviews.author: Yekat

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have for man and woman!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase ever made (according to my gf). I'm a man, a very hairy one and this worked great. I had to use almost a single bottle but it worked like a charm and I'll definitely purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough.
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my legs and under arms. I have coarse textured hair on both areas and consider my hair to be pretty thick. I left it under my arms for 7 minutes and on one of my legs for7-8 and the other for minutes. On my under arms 7 minutes worked perfectly on my legs i had a number of hairs left over throughout. I will keep it on for 10 minutes next time and see if that does the trick. Overall I really like the product and would buy it again. Do a body part at a time and leave it for a shorter amount of time to make sure you don't irritate your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick hair beware.
customer_reviews.text: Not the right product for me. It worked on my legs a little, but only after multiple applications that were ultimately less timely than just shaving; I have coarse hair and wanted to try something different. Perhaps it gives better results to those with thinner hair, but those with thick hair should look somewhere else. The smell really isn't bad and doesn't stick around after rinsing, but the cream itself will clog up a washcloth easily. Yes, there is a burn, so it would be wise to take it off in under ten minutes as instructed on the back of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Price is nice
customer_reviews.text: Me and my man both use this and never have any issues with burning or bumps. The smell isn’t the best, but nair never will. This 3 pack was worth the price, I’m very thrifty and typically we pay about $7-8 for ONE bottle at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because, no matter how expensive a razor I use I get razor burn and irritated skin. I seriously had my doubts this would work, but gave it a try out of desperation. Surprisingly, it works very well. It doesn’t get it quite as close as some of the high end razors I’ve tried, but to be razor burn free it’s worth the trade off.
customer_reviews.author: bre

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely do test spots, my inner thighs got irritated but my face did not. I fixed that by using light moisturizer before and after.
customer_reviews.author: ihatelapels

customer_reviews.title: Works quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different hair removers and this Nair product is the easiest and most effect one I have found. I do leave it on for about 5 or 6 minutes when the instructions call for three minutes and no longer than 10. It leaves my legs and pubic area silky smooth with no redness. This seems to last a lot longer than shaving. I usually shave about every three days and nair keeps me smooth for about 7 or 8 days. It does have a slight odor but it is not that bad and after rinsing off in the shower it seems to be gone.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Thick Coarse Hair
customer_reviews.text: I have super hairy legs and coarse hair, I had to leave it on for about 6 minutes and 40 seconds. It still didn't get all the hairs out. But it really went to town on most of the hairs. I didn't have an allergic reaction to this stuff as people have said before, so I guess that's a plus. My legs feel smoother than my face
customer_reviews.author: Jensen T.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy unless you are depleted of options.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be different from other hair removing lotions but when my wife used it she went through itching and at times, even blood oozed out of her pores. Wish nobody should fall in the trap of buying 3 bottles at one go (unfortunately for us, only 3-pack bottles were available). I couldn't even return it as we had opened one bottle of the pack and return date had passed. VERY DISAPPOINTED as their wax is far more better than this lotion.
customer_reviews.author: rahul

customer_reviews.title: Read instructions
customer_reviews.text: When the instructions says to leave it on for no more than 3 min they weren’t lying!!! I got cocky and decided that 3min was not enough and when I took it off my legs were burning and very irritated 😂😂
customer_reviews.author: Libni Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this product. The only thing that I don’t like is the smell because is really strong but other than that it works great. When using this product be very careful in what parts of your body you use it. I put some on my chest and a little bit got on my nipples and it burned my nipples.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Angel Santos henriquez

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, but not for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: It was worth the try and experience. I don't recommend Original Nair Lotion if you have very sensitive skin. Pick the type for sensitive ones! The value for 3 packs is great. Won't use razor for a year or so!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Only one bottle!
customer_reviews.text: This product says package of three, but I only received one. Even after trying again, I only received one. Beware! Don’t spend this much for one bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised with how well this worked for arm hair. Only thing we did not like was how greasy it made your hands feel even after washing many times.
customer_reviews.author: Brett p.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use without a horrible odor.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is easy as pie to use. It is quick and effective without leaving a horrible odor like many similar products. Apply, wipe, and rinse. It left no irritation, and a smooth surface. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ThatCat

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It works. Use it for about 3 or 4 minutes and then use a wet cloth to wipe it off. Then the hair gone. It‘s easy to use and its price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Imia

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: For females this probably works great, for males as an alternative to shaving body parts I'd pass. After trying it on my chest I don't feel the time, smell, or burning is worth it over shaving.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Not a 3-pack
customer_reviews.text: This is actually for 1, it is not a pack of 3.
customer_reviews.author: CA472

customer_reviews.title: Great product and always test first
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product for my legs and armpits id be careful about bikini area definitely test a small portion my taco totally got burned and i used it on the pubic bone area and it's just... Ow... Be careful
customer_reviews.author: Kubies

customer_reviews.title: 9/10 smooth lég
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use as long as you follow the directions, and makes your skin smooth. However it smells horrible, be warned.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: I won't buy this again
customer_reviews.text: Remives hair quickly but this is not for sensitive skin. It irritates my skin right after hair removal and burnt my skin. I'd return the product if I could.
customer_reviews.author: S M Shafiul Hasan

customer_reviews.title: Awful product
customer_reviews.text: Awful product it does not work at all. Left it on there past the time it says to wipe it off like 30 minutes an still did not work. Just use a razor.
customer_reviews.author: The shopping lady

customer_reviews.title: Burning!
customer_reviews.text: I used Veet cream before, this time it was out of stock and I decided to try this Nair cream. It’s not thick so always dipping on the floor. And it burns skin a lot!!!! Put 2 starts just because it does it’s actual job, other than this it’s bad
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used but it’s clearly nair and it’s a great value for the price, same size as the in store nair
customer_reviews.author: Beverly venable

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and love that I got 3 of them. This stuff is so helpful for someone chronically ill. It hurts to shave and this is a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: I hate the feeling and smell it leaves my skin afterwards
customer_reviews.text: It definitely works, and it really smells. I hate the feeling and smell it leaves my skin afterwards. Do not use it anywhere else except your legs and/or arms. And after use, please exfoliate so you don't get any ingrowns.
customer_reviews.author: Manda A

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use but I had to leave on about 5 min extra and still had stubble patches
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: It is an amazing product works very fast and leave skin very smooth ...
customer_reviews.text: It is an amazing product works very fast and leave skin very smooth just for sensitive area dont let it be too long or else it will start burning besde that i m very happy for stopping wasting my money on veet and bought something very affordable and quick working product love it
customer_reviews.author: Lemar

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My wife has used this product for years. It is very convenient to be able to get it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Nice hair remover
customer_reviews.text: On subscription for a reason, it removes all here in less than 10 minutes without a funky smell! Leaving skin feeling really soft.
customer_reviews.author: T. Presson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: First time I've ever used a cream hair remover and I got excellent results. I tested after the recommended 3 minutes and there was still some hair left. I waited an extra 3 and hair was all gone. I applied with hospital gloves because of the reviews stating it was hard on hands and finger nails. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie A

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for me and the odor (while seeming to appeal to some) is gross to me. I tested it on a small area as directed. It didn't cause a reaction so the next day I tried it all over my legs. Still no reaction, but it didn't take the hair off. I left it on for more than the 10 minutes recommended and it still didn't take enough hair off. It took at least 10 minutes to wash the stuff off too. So it's back to shaving for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works the best ever. Never shave the bikini area again
customer_reviews.text: Works the best ever. Never shave the bikini area again....or wax ...ouch. my hair is toughbut, when left for 10 minutes they wiped right off. Use liberally. I had to reapply the first time because I was nervous to use too much.
customer_reviews.author: Melina

customer_reviews.title: Recommended to buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I was a Veet customer for a long time and I was confused about ordering it. But then I gave a chance to it and order this removing creme and I found it very helpful. It clears my hair smoothly. I didn't face any irritation over my skin and it worked for me in removing my all hair for around a week.
customer_reviews.author: Nazia Riasat

customer_reviews.title: Does what is advertises.
customer_reviews.text: This does what is advertises but for me take longer than I was expecting. I have to leave a thick layer on my skin for about 10 - 12 minutes, longer than recommended by the way, to get all the hairs. The smell while not bad does tend to stick around for a while, I found letting a scented candle burn for a while covers this issue.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Works on thick hair, no burn
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I doesn’t smell as much or at all like previous hair products I’ve used. In addition, I can use under my armpits, legs and bikini area with no burning sensation. It works on thick hair as well. The only thing I would advise is to never exceed the recommended times. You could end up with red bums or even bleeding a little . Overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Best Hair Removal Lotion
customer_reviews.text: First time trying the nair cocoa butter and its my new favorite. Great scent and works well. Also a good deal getting a pack of 3.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: The holy grail of hair removal!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this product! I neglected my poor legs all winter and I knew my hair was too long to shave. I can’t believe in about 6-7 minutes the hair just wiped off! I currently have a cold, so I wasn’t able to smell the usual “Nair” smell. My legs are silky smooth now
customer_reviews.author: Carrie O

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I don’t mind the scent. It works perfectly for my hairy legs.
customer_reviews.author: Saida Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, value for money and remove hair quickly
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders!!! Can’t beleieve how much hair came off. I’ll be honest, I left on a little longer than the recommended 10 minutes and did experience a little burning but that went away as soon as I washed it off.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with this product
customer_reviews.text: This product is very strong. I caused chemical burns in the area it was applied. I did 2 three minutes applications to remove all of the hair in the applied area.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Do you like CHEMICAL BURNS?
customer_reviews.text: Try it if you want to give yourself CHEMICAL BURNS and remove half the hair... I did 24 hour spot test, no problems. Followed directions, applied to lower legs, and experienced extreme pain while trying wash this crap off. Now I can’t even shave because my skin is so damaged. You have been warned...
customer_reviews.author: dawn tupciauskas

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I have never used the Cocoa Butter Nair before, but for the price, less than $15 for three bottles, I figured, why not? Works just as well as the Aloe Nair products that I normally use, and gets rid of nasty unwanted hair on my legs just as it's intended to do. I leave it on for about 4 minutes, a bit longer than advised, but that is because I have stubborn hair. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: banshee70

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I used to be a veet user until I found the deal on this. Now I'm not going back. It seems to work quicker and it's easier to squirt out the bottle when your hand are covered as opposed to trying to use the pump tops.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: It’s my favorite and only way to get rid of the hair. It’s fast, painless, lasts for ~a week. It takes your skin to get used to it to give you best results. Also be careful with the timing.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasiia

customer_reviews.title: JUST GET IT! I Never knew about body removal cream till now.
customer_reviews.text: So easy! Just put a dollop on your legs, smother around, wait a few minutes, and BAM! Smooth legs! I followed directions closely to ensure no chemical burns. Because I have very thick leg hair, I rubbed it in a little with no problems
customer_reviews.author: eggs816

customer_reviews.title: Nair...
customer_reviews.text: It’s nair... melts my hair off in minutes with unknown chemicals so yeah 5 stars ⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Hairless and careful
customer_reviews.text: Nair is the only way to hair removal. I have been using Nair for over two decades ,from the neck down. Only had one problem, wasn't being careful and got it on my nipples and scrotum and burned the hell out of them. Never made that mistake again.h
customer_reviews.author: Seenit Doneit

customer_reviews.title: Works well but hurts
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well the only issue i have with it is that it burns the hell out of your skin excuse my french but it hurts so bad but in the end it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Time incorrect
customer_reviews.text: Don't leave on your skin for three min or you will be burned! I do like this product as oppose to shaving.
customer_reviews.author: Saketa Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Works great especially since regular razors don’t do well shaving my coarse hair in my legs. A life saver!! My legs did have a slight reaction to it, but nothing I couldn’t handle.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia J

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years, actually over 20 years. Just what I expected for a much better price.
customer_reviews.author: Kneesee Knows

customer_reviews.title: Supposed to have received 3
customer_reviews.text: I paid for 3 of these and only one came with a bother order I had made earlier. I really hope I get the other two or I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: yikes
customer_reviews.text: I applied it to my lower leg and left it on for about 8 minutes. It was super hard to get off, and my skin is now red and irritated. It feels raw. I wish I could return because it is not worth the money. It also didn’t even remove the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Needs MAJOR updates

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth for the nether region.
customer_reviews.text: Use this as directed. Don't exceed the 10 min mark and you're good to go. You may have some discomfort that goes away quickly....at least it did for me. More hygienic now and well...you know. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Guarascio

customer_reviews.title: Saves time. No shaving need
customer_reviews.text: This saves so much time and very quick and easy to use. I didn't have any bad reactions
customer_reviews.author: Tavia

customer_reviews.title: Using  nair for years makes ur legs  feel soft..
customer_reviews.text: Luv it but ..its cheaper at target.. I purchased 3 bc they were on sale..
customer_reviews.author: newapt52

customer_reviews.title: Great for the value
customer_reviews.text: Great for legs, quick and easy to use, I ran out the first bottle in the second use.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This works okay. It'll irritate your skin if you have sensitive skin, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Sensual scent my a**, still a good deal though
customer_reviews.text: This air smells just like the rest (perming treatment) but I wasn't really expecting anything different. But the price was good and it did it's job as expected. Doesn't really last any longer than shaving but it is much less work.
customer_reviews.author: Emily McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! When I first tried it I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! When I first tried it I was skeptical as to if I would get burnt using it or if it would even work but it works great! It does have a strong smell but I could expect that from something like this, I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: SO GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Such a great thing to have. I originally boguht this because I was unbale to shave due to a bad case of posion Ivy... now I;m not sure if I'll ever shave again! lol Such a fast and easy way to get rid of unwanted hair!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Not the best on legs; best on face
customer_reviews.text: Works much better on face than body. Does practically nothing for legs.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Myers

customer_reviews.title: Pack of ONE
customer_reviews.text: The description of this product says “pack of 3” and it only came with one bottle. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: kendra

customer_reviews.title: Work great for me
customer_reviews.text: The product says leave it like 3 minutes, I left it like 8 minutes and the results are great, and no burns
customer_reviews.author: Touta

customer_reviews.title: Nair
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work as well as I expected it would have
customer_reviews.author: SANTIA S. CHINGOFOR

customer_reviews.title: Too smelly
customer_reviews.text: Too smelly, too thick and hard to rid it from your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Lobo

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: Why did I not do this sooner???? 20 years pf shaving?! No more. Amazing. And I have sensitive skin. It's fine
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Its ok I guess
customer_reviews.text: Removes hair faster. Hair grows back like I just razored it.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn G.

customer_reviews.title: ... for thick/coarse hair but forget it if you have fine hair. It removed my underarm hair effectively and ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for thick/coarse hair but forget it if you have fine hair. It removed my underarm hair effectively and painlessly but my legs burned when I put this on.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Love this cream!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the cream, is really helpful and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! No more shaving
customer_reviews.text: Never knew that hair could be so easily removed! I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jada

customer_reviews.title: It works quite well for shaving
customer_reviews.text: This product has a very odd scent but it overall works good to shave your legs
customer_reviews.author: Kevin cook

customer_reviews.title: It smells like Nair; like you'd expect.
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the usual Nair smell, it works fantastically and leaves my skin feeling super smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Rogers

customer_reviews.title: It burnt my skin.
customer_reviews.text: Be careful using this product. It burnt my skin, and the smell is awful. Even after a shower, the smell was still intense. It did remove most of the hair though.
customer_reviews.author: Paxton Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Very effective, affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Once the arrival of the goods used, depilation effect is good! It's just a little strong! Still be worth to recommend nevertheless, the price is very affordable also!
customer_reviews.author: jie lin

customer_reviews.title: The best product for my coarse hair!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried basically every cream out there and this one is by far the best for me. I have dark and coarse hair on my legs and this cream really does removed all of it and leaves my legs nice and moisturized. It doesn't take long either. I just start slathering it on and once I'm done, I wait 3-4 minutes and that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Coral Del Mar

product_meta.title: Nair Hair Remover Cocoa Butter Hair Removal Lotion, 9.0 oz. , Pack of 3
product_meta.description: Color:PinkGet ready to bare more and wear less with Nair Hair Remover Lotion! Enjoy soft, smooth skin with Nair Lotion with Cocoa Butter and Vitamin E without the nicks, cuts, and bumps that can occur from shaving. This hair removal lotion is scented with warm, seductive notes of Cocoa Butter and infused with Vitamin E. In as little as 3 minutes, reveal silky-smooth, touchable skin that lasts days longer than shaving.
feature_bullets: From the #1 Hair Removal Brand* *Among Depilatory/Wax/Bleach products. Data from AC Nielsen, Total AOC Latest 52 Weeks ending 7/15/17
Remove unwanted hair from legs, arms, underarms, and bikini line
Scented with warm, seductive notes of Cocoa Butter and Vitamin E
Works in as little as 3 minutes
